reports.query:
**This is your first dashboard!** 
 
You can click (â‹®) to edit this report, or add a new report to get started. You can run any Cypher query directly from each report and render data in a variety of formats. 
 
Tip: try _renaming_ this report by editing the title text. You can also edit the dashboard header at the top of the screen.
